wikipedia_page.main:
John Barber (8 January 1901 – 30 March 1961) was an English footballer. His regular position was as a forward. He was born in Salford, Lancashire. He played for Clayton, Chesterfield, Southport, and Manchester United.
He spent three games on loan at Mossley in December 1923, scoring one goal. Later in his career he played for Halifax Town, Rochdale, Stockport County and Bacup Borough.
